i've never been so mad at people who tbags before

It's hard to leave a thumbs down. I just don't like the way the game has evolved over the years. Initially it was easy as a survivor then an over correction and it's way too far in the killers favour. I'm not going to try and offer a fix as I don't think there is one. 

I do think letting the perks of other characters/killers was a mistake as you can clearly see that in guides there are those must have perks regardless of who your character is. Just generalizes the experience. 

Lastly, I think there are just too many killers (and DLC) in that you need to be aware of every single killers abilities going in to a game (along with the previously mentioned perks any could have) in order to have a chance. 

I play both sides. I don't believe in camping hooks, it's just bad points for everyone. I guess the take away from this review is i'd like more of a unique playing experience than a generic one where it doesn't matter which character you play.

So, i've got a lot of hours in this game. I've been playing it since release, basically. Would I recommend this game? If you're playing with friends only, sure, it's a fun time with 5 buddies in kill your friends. However, I can't condone the bullshit in this game anymore. The balance is all over the place whacky, no side can ever be happy. Which leads to the MOST toxic playerbase i've ever seen in my life. Death threats, comment spam, harassment, taunting, and overall disgusting behaviour is on display at least 1 in every 3 matches. The devs themselves aren't much better either, with every patch they add more and more perks and useless garbage to hide away the perks needed to actually be competent. Every matchup is "oh, you would've won if you had this perk", but you know how to get that perk? Over 1000 hours of playtime, grinding, and running through their garbage progression system. Even then, I still don't have half the perks for the like 50+ playable killers and survivors at this point. Is it a game that has a lot of love and cool stuff behind it? Yeah, absolutely. Is it a game you honestly should spend your time playing? No. It's an addiction and a toxic rabbit hole. My advice? Stay away unless you're playing with ONLY a couple of friends. This game will always be a cesspool, and anyone who disagrees doesn't play it enough.

The game is really, really fun. If you don't know any better, and you don't become more skillful, and don't want to get to high rank. The objective is not fun, the game's balance is heavily favored towards the majority, which you might think is a good thing but it's entirely counter-intuitive for game design. (Example: do you believe there are an equal amount of new, bad, casual, good, and professional players?... or might that just be a reasonable thing to forget, or not think about).

I don't know, really, where to begin with this. It's just disappointing is all.
very fun apart from campy killers but other than that really fun!
